description:
Atsushi searches desperately for the control terminal, which he would need to stop the Moby Dick from crashing into Yokohama. He`s greeted by Akutagawa and Francis, both of whom have other plans in mind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rashomon und Tiger und der letzte Tycoon
Rashoumon to Tora to Saigou ni Ookimi
Rashoumon, la Tigre e l`ultimo imperatore
Rashoumon, the Tiger, and the Last Emperor
Rashômon, le tigre et le dernier magnat
羅生門と虎と最後の大君
